meratin thawath korona wairas aasadithayan 1086 k warthawi thibenawa.mema aasadithayan 1086 th samanga merata korona aasadithayan sankhyawa 250,000 simawa ikmuwa.ee anuwa meratin me dakwa korona aasadithayan 251,023k hamuwi thibenawa.emenma eeye (25) dinaye kowid aasaditha marana 43k siduwi athi bawata saukhya sewa adhyaksha janaralwaraya wisin ada thahawuru kara thibenawa.me anuwa merata samastha kowid aasaditha marana ganana 2905k dakwa ihala giya.me athara, kowid -19 wairasaya aasadanaya wi rohalgathawa prathikara gena purna suwaya labu 2172deneku ada (24) dinaye pitawagos thibenawa.ee anuwa suwaya labu samastha aasadithayin ganana 216,840k.

subhashini jayarathnakolambaata kendragatha wu ingrisi adhyapanaya gamata gena yame aramunin aarambha wu jiwana nipunathawak lesa ingrisi wadapiliwele dewani adiyara mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma athin heta aarambha weyi.masa 13ka sita kriyathmaka kerunu palamu adiyaredi pasal paddhathiya haraha lamayinta ingrisi kathanaya ha shrawana nipunathawa laba dun athara eya itha sarthaka wi atha.heta aarambha kerena dewani adiyara wenwanne samanya janathawata ha rakiyawala niyuthu piris sandaha ingrisi nipunathawa labadimataya.wishwawidyalawala ingrisi puhunu widwathun wisin sakas kala paya 3200kin ingrisi iganwime wishaya malawa heta dina janadhipathithuma athin diyath kirimata niyamithaya.
